items.sentence: Do you think Tom would really want to dance with me?
I haven't had a boyfriend since I broke up with Tom.
Why didn't you ever tell me that you studied French?
Tom let himself in using the key that I'd given him.
Tom turned himself in three days after killing Mary.
It seems like we've been talking about this all day.
I think you know that we need to buy some more food.
I need to know you're doing what we asked you to do.
The soldier who stopped the bus made us all get off.
Every time Tom's parents would argue, Tom would cry.
